name: Radio Balance
description:
Bio:

Radio Balance - game maded for "No Touch Screen or Mouse JAM". Time elapsed = 16 hours. I made this game without teammate helps with Unity2D.

Instructions:

Use your android gyroscope for the saving the "Radio Balance's" air. At this game used music, created by RoccoW, and distributed by CC0.

Good luck and have fun.

Created by: Dmitrij Stepovoj - Russia
